ingredients.ingredient: 2 medium zucchini, cut into noodles with a spiralizer
12 zucchini blossoms, pistils removed, cut into strips
½ cup canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed
6 fresh basil leaves, cut into strips

cookingTips: Spiralize zucchini just before cooking to prevent excess moisture
Cook noodles briefly—just 2-3 minutes—to maintain slight firmness
Add delicate zucchini blossoms at the very end to preserve their texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me prepare delicate zucchini blossoms and cook zucchini noodles without making them mushy.
